Dina Amer bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Egypt-American, onye edemede, onye mmepụta na onye nta akụkọ.
A mụrụ Amer ma zuokwa  ya na United States.

Ọrụ ndị amer bu ndi The New York Times, CNN, na VICE biputarala.
N'afọ 2011, ọ natara onyinye Kahlil Gibran Spirit of Humanity Award site na Arab American Institute Foundation (AAIF) maka mkpesa omere banyere Arab Spring na Egypt. N'afọ 2016, ọkpesara banyere ịzụ ahịa mmadụ nke ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ nke agha obodo Siria na akụ na ụba dị n'okpuru ala nke ihe mgbochi iwu na-akwadoghị nke Egypt gaza maka mmemme Vice News Black Market: Dispatches

Ihe nkiri izizi Amer, You Resemble Me, gosipụtara na 78th Venice International Film Festival. Maka ihe nkiri ya Cain na Abel, nke ya na Omar Mullick dere, a kpọrọ ya na Sundance Screenwriters' Lab na Jenụwarị 2022.
